editorialNotes.standard: You need toothpaste, golf clubs, and batteries—and you need them now. Known for its colossal shopping catalog, Amazon packs virtually all of the features and functions found on its website into this ample app, whether you’re buying gifts, tracking orders, or scanning items in a brick-and-mortar store for an online price comparison. It’s easy to navigate, intuitive, and extremely fast.
editorialNotes.short: Size up your next couch with AR product stickers
This perfect shopping app for that look that you won't find in any mall.

editorialNotes.standard: Walmart’s app lets you browse thousands of products, search for items that have recently gone on sale and even refill your prescriptions. But the savings catcher is pure genius: scan a receipt for any purchase made in the last seven days, and if a competitor in your area is advertising a lower price, Walmart automatically gives you the difference. It’s a fantastic, hassle-free way to save money without the need to shop around.
editorialNotes.short: Shop groceries and millions of other items
Big 11.11 deals on China's largest direct-buying portal.

editorialNotes.standard: From flatscreen TVs to patio furniture, from motor oil to Minecraft hoodies, chances are Target has what you’re looking for. We use this intuitive app to snag that one item we need or browse popular deals in our favorite categories. Target can deliver items to your door or get them ready for pickup at your nearest Target store, and Apple Pay support means fast, hassle-free checkout. You might consider buying a nice rocking chair to sit in while telling kids how hard shopping was back in the old days.
editorialNotes.short: Plan the perfect Target run (or have it delivered)

editorialNotes.standard: There are some extraordinarily clever and crafty people in the world, and we’re glad so many of them use Etsy to share their amazing wares. We love searching it to find unique and thoughtful gifts, from one-of-a-kind handcrafted jackets to customized videogame consoles. Etsy is clean, professional, and easy to use—whether you’re an avid shopper or an entrepreneur using it to run your business.
editorialNotes.short: Shop unique, vintage, and handcrafted goods
Decorate your home with stylish furniture
editorialNotes.tagline: See items in 3D before you buy
